linkfield_statich.name: recordlink
linkfield_statich.script:
function onInit() local node = window.getDatabaseNode(); local bIsInHand = CardsManager.isCardInHand(node); local bIsInStorage = CardStorage.isCardInStorage(node);
if Session.IsHost and not (bIsInHand or bIsInStorage) then registerMenuItem(Interface.getString("card_menu_clear"), "delete", 5) end
super.onInit() self.onValueChanged() end function onMenuSelection(selection) local bReadOnly = WindowManager.getReadOnlyState(window.getDatabaseNode()); if bReadOnly then return end
if selection == 5 then setValue("", "") window.update() end end function onValueChanged() if super and super.onValueChanged then super.onValueChanged() end
window.recordlink_label.update() end

label_column.name: recordlink_label
label_column.script: function update() local recordnode = CardsManager.getCardRecordLinkNode(window.getDatabaseNode()) if not recordnode then setValue() else setValue(DB.getValue(recordnode, "name", "")) end end
